column5: My last few trips have been solo!  With my fishing buddy in his third trimester I don't think he will be allowed out of the house for the rest of the year!  The weather report looks great for Sunday, anyone want to go out for a day on Erie? I'll be leaving from Mississauga and launching out of Crystal Beach.  I would like to try a walleye troll and if that fails switch over to some bass or perch.
